name: To Do List
about: A to do list project which was created during studying at Hyper Island. The app allows user to add and delete tasks and lists, mark tasks as important and completed. All data is stored in Local Storage.
stack: Responsive layout powered by Grid and Flexbox

name: Phonebook
about: The app allows user to add name and phone number to the phonebook, search through them, and delete them.

name: Music Box
about: An app that uses Genius API to search for songs.
